about_the_game:
Europe 2041: Resistance is an upcoming turn-based casual strategy.

As the commander of a small unit of resistance fighters, your mission is to travel around the continent, choose your operators, equip them with weapons, and engage in tactical battles against the occupiers in this turn-based strategy game.

Enter the dark world of occupied Europe, and do not refuse any helping hand. Strategize your way through a multitude of enemies and liberate Europe.

Occupied Europe

Travel around occupied Europe and engage the enemy in 8+ different handcrafted missions.

Resistance movement

Carefully select operators for your missions from a list of 15+ recruitable individuals found on your journey through the continent. Each operator possesses a unique set of skills and attributes to contribute to the liberation of Europe.

Equip your fighters

Outfit your operators with 15+ different weapons and equipment to further customize them and increase their lethality. Fine-tune your squad to maximize your chances of success.

Freedom

Battle against 10+ different enemies and enemy bosses, each equipped with a different set of skills and stats in exciting on-the-ground combat. Prove yourself worthy and liberate Europe from the occupiers.
